Framework Docs
Table of Contents

Class Result<T>

Namespace
NuvTools.Common.ResultWrapper
Assembly
NuvTools.Common.dll

Represents a generic operation result that carries a data payload along with success status and message details.

public class Result<T> : ResultBase, IResult<T>, IResult

Type Parameters

T

The type of data returned by the operation.

Inheritance
object

Result<T>

Examples

Example usage:

IResult<UserDto> result = await _userService.GetUserByIdAsync(1);

if (result.Succeeded)
{
    Console.WriteLine($"User: {result.Data!.Name}");
}
else
{
    logger.LogWarning(result.Message);
}

Remarks

This class provides a unified and type-safe way to return both data and status information from service or repository operations.

Constructors

Result() 

public Result()

The data returned by the operation, if applicable.
